landing.heroTitle: Immerse yourself in knowledge with artificial intelligence
landing.heroSubtitle: Have you ever felt like you're "drowning" in new material? Spending hours reading, but the essence slips away?
landing.feature1Title: All your important files, always safe and accessible.
landing.feature1Desc: Your secure digital hard drive in the cloud - accessible from anywhere, at any time.
landing.feature2Desc: Share files with colleagues, friends, or family with just a few clicks. You control who can access and edit the shared content.
landing.feature3Desc: Work on projects together in real-time. Comment, edit, and brainstorm directly in the cloud, without the need for downloading. Preview files before you open them.
landing.feature4Desc: Relax knowing your files are automatically backed up and synced across all your devices.

plans.title: Simple pricing for every need
plans.subtitle: Choose a plan that best suits your business.

betaAccess.title: Beta Access
betaAccess.description: One account user, log in once in a while.

base.title: Base
base.description: A shared vault for family to store videos, photos, and family documents.

plus.title: Plus
plus.description: Special design for freelancers, solopreneurs, and creators.
